mapper.select: select id, name, license from bcc_member where id like concat('%', #{id}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into bcc_plan(num, grp_name, leader) values(#{num}, #{grp_name}, #{leader})
mapper.select: select grp_num, sender, grp_name from bcc_grp_accept a join bcc_plan b on a.grp_num = b.num where receiver = #{receiver};
mapper.delete: delete from bcc_grp_accept where grp_num=#{grp_num} and receiver=#{receiver}
mapper.select: select grp_num, grp_name from bcc_plan_member a join bcc_plan b on a.grp_num = b.num where id = #{id} order by grp_num desc
